text: breaking news out of san antonio texas a
horrifying discovery 46 people found
dead in the back of an abandoned
18-wheeler in sweltering heat with 16
more including four children rushed to
nearby hospitals
found a
trailer with the doors partially open
opened them up to take a look and found
a number of
deceased individuals inside
investigators believe the victims are
migrants saying tonight they suspect the
tragedy is part of a human smuggling
operation one of the worst in the
state's history authorities say the
truck had no air conditioning the
patients that we saw were hot to the
touch
they were suffering
from heat stroke heat exhaustion
no signs of water in the vehicle police
say three people have been taken into
custody tonight we are dealing with a
horrific human tragedy
so i would urge you all to think
